abstract: Citigroup‘s directors have been re-elected, but they were shelled with criticism at Tuesday’s annual meeting of shareholders, whose stock in the bank has lost half its value since they convened a year ago.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup‘s directors have been re-elected, but they were shelled with criticism at Tuesday’s annual meeting of shareholders, whose stock in the bank has lost half its value since they convened a year ago.

headline.main: An Uncomfortable Shareholder’s Meeting for Citigroup
